message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm happy to start the negotiations at $1,500,000. I believe this price reflects the true value and potential of what's being offered.
Alice, your initial offer is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. This is my best offer considering the value it holds for me.  Let me know your thoughts.

Bob, I appreciate you getting back to me and providing your perspective on the value.  While I understand your offer, I'm still confident in the original asking price. To move things along, I can come down to $1,400,000. I think this is a fair compromise.

Alice, thanks for being flexible.  I'm still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to go to $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for me and your desired profit. I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.
